articles.title: Circle and Sony partner to bring USDC to Soneium
articles.description:
The partnership could significantly enhance digital finance and entertainment, promoting global adoption of decentralized technologies.
The post Circle and Sony partner to bring USDC to Soneium appeared first on Crypto Briefing.
articles.content:
Key Takeaways
  • Circle and Sony have partnered to integrate USDC as a primary token on Soneium.
  • The partnership aims to enhance secure, user-friendly Web3 experiences for creators.
